document_data.name: Stars and Sword
document_data.mainbody: The '''Stars and Sword''' was a tavern in [[Westgate]] during the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Structure: The sign was en[[spell]]ed to be bright, animated, and sparkly.
document_data.Services: There were stables, meals, drinks, and such fare. Additionally, there was a dancer with supernatural powers of prophecy, [[Alshinree]], who sometimes gave directions to hidden [[magic]] to passing wizards.
document_data.Defenses: People who sought Alshinree outside the tavern met with unfortunate ends.
document_data.History: [[Ilbryn Starym]] visited the tavern in the {{yearlinkName|767}}, giving a bit of a fright to the locals.
